DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine satisfaction among parent nurse pediatric patient IV catheter placement Emergency Department .
DOC.brief_title: Satisfaction With Pediatric Intravenous Catheter Placement Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study evaluate whether proportion parent satisfy child 's IV placement procedure high introduction Zingo compare standard care evaluate change nurse staff satisfaction perform IV placement procedure use Zingo prior IV placement compare standard care .
DOC.criteria: PHASE A : Parent pediatric patient age 3 18 year age require peripheral IV placement Emergency Department Parent must able read understand English provide write informed consent Parent must present IV placement PHASE B : Parent participate Phase A Nurse complete Zingo TM inservice train prior participation Zingo use prior perform IV placement procedure Parent patient serious unstable medical psychological condition would compromise participation study
